6.26.25  1:16 pm   Hi, Bill. At what age do you think we start to feel like an adult?

6.26.25  12:31 pm   bill your song 'i'm a princess' raises real questions about the true meaning of royal lineage. the princess is evidently moving towards better things despite her (his?) paranoia about the neighbours (symbolising the working class) so it makes me wonder about the self-reinforced legitimacy of authority. then of course the conclusion completely brings down our understanding of princesshood and tells us that it was an illusion all along, that we allowed the fantasy of royalty to exist, it was just written in the fine print that it was a construction. so are you really a princess?
6.26.25  10:58 am   How do you feel about power chords? I can't recall you playing power chords in one of your songs, but I could be wrong.

6.26.25  9:17 am   Ghosts, is there any credibility? I understand ghost hunting relies on pseudoscience & confirmation bias. However my spouse will look me dead in the eyes, swearing that they saw a loved one walk by in the house they died in. I know they wouldn't lie to me, I'm torn here.
6.26.25  6:49 am   Whath doth yer thinketh of longer songs, like 10-16 min long? Would you ever like to do one?

6.25.25  10:23 pm   what's your favorite musical key

6.25.25  9:55 pm   Again, thank you for not posting a lot of opinions about potentially divisive political and social topics. I'm so weary of all the polarized arguments in our society, and I love that I can just enjoy your music and come to your website without having to think about whether we see eye to eye on issues, which could distract from the wonder of your art. It's a relief not to have to go there. Do you intentionally avoid those types of topics?

6.25.25  4:01 pm   I'm so bad at scheduling. I'm sooooo so bad, even though I've tried many times. I can 90% say I know exactly what the ____ is like you were saying to someone a little while ago, but I honestly have no way of knowing how long these things take, and then "it'll be recorded next week" is then "it's been months and I'm stuck on the same thing AGHH"
